ai-atk-s0302a9:42_3: They agree with the true teaching and convergence of those who have gathered together.
ai-atk-s0302a9:42_4: Since the teaching and training proclaimed by the Buddha, they declared those teachings.
ai-atk-s0302a9:42_5: They’ve been well trained by the noble preceptors and well trained in the teaching.
ai-atk-s0302a9:42_6: but its all is seen everywhere.
ai-atk-s0302a9:43_0: The Book of the Aggregates is finished.
ai-atk-s0302a9:44_0: So there are many ways of mentors with the ascetic Gotama.
ai-atk-s0302a9:45_0: The Book of Causality is finished.
